verbs.description: rodgers [V: may] have to wear larger knee brace after setback green bay packers quarterback aaron rodgers may have to wear a larger brace on his left knee after suffering a setback during sunday game against the detroit lions rodgers initially injured his knee during a week 1 victory over the chicago bears and he sported a brace since the two - time mvp wore a smaller brace against the lions in week 5 when he re - aggravated the injury rodgers did n't practice on thursday but he still expects to start chicago bears detroit lions rob demovsky green bay packers aaron rodgers rodgers packers
